owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Calais Semantic Tagging Ontology for the OneCalais service
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: Calais Semantic Tagging Ontology for the OneCalais service

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Category
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: URI for the identified category/topic of the submitted content based on the Calais document classification module

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: city
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a city, village or settlement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Canonic name of a company entity that is a participant in an event/fact

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Canonic name of a company entity that is a participant in an event/fact

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: CompanyFormer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Former company name

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Acquirer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that acquires another company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Affiliate
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is a subsidiary or division of another company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Being Acquired
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is acquired by another company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Customer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that purchases products or services from another entity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Distributor
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is a distributor of products

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Formername
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Former company name prior to a name change

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Investigated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The company under investigation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Investor
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company making an investment in another company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Investee
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company being invested in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Newname
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: New company name resulting from joint venture or a company's name change

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Parent
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is a parent of another company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Plaintiff
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is a plaintiff in a legal issue

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Provider
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that sells products or services to another entity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Rated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is being rated by analysts for its credit, equity, financial performance, etc.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Recalling
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is recalling a product

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Source
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is an investment bank/analyst company issuing rating or recommendation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Company Sued
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company that is being sued in a legal issue

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Country Rated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The Country which is being rated

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Asset ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: ID of physical asset

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Asset RIC
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: RIC of physical asset

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: PeType
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of Private Equity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Confidence Level
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The Confidence Score on an extracted entity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Country
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of country referred to in text

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Document Id
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: URI of the processed content for future retrievals

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ForEndUserDisplay
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Denotes whether a specific markup is for end user display

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: DealSDCNum
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: DealSDCNum

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: EDCO ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company's EDCO ID (Identifier Derived from Organization Authority Dataset)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Legacy ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company resolution id for bridging the gap between former and current versions of OpenCalais

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Open Permid
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: permid.org Company id

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Message Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of an error message

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Selected components versions
The effect of an environmental issue: devastation, ruin, death, etc...

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: age
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A person's Age

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Birth Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A person's date of birth

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Birth Place
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A person's place of birth

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Facility
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a facility

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Language
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: URI of the identified language for the submitted content

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Location
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Location name where certain events occurred

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Officer ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The ID of the officer from a TR dataset

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Organization
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Canonic name of an organization entity that is a participant in an event/fact

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Organization Customer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Organization that purchases products or services from another entity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Organization Issuer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Organization that issues a wanting about products or services of another company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Organization Rated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Organization that is being rated by analysts for its credit status

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Organization Regulator
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The regulator involved in an investigation on a company.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Perm ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The Perm ID of an entity as taken from a TR dataset

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Dual Listed Perm ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The Perm ID of an entity as taken from a TR dataset

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Dual Listed Primary RIC
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company's primary RIC

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: EDCO ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company's EDCO ID (Identifier Derived from Organization Authority Dataset)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ISO 6391
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: ISO 6391 mapping for language codes

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: NDA Org ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Organization id as it is in NDA

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: TPharma Org ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Organization id as it is in TPharma

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Asset4 Org ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Organization id as it is in Asset4

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Person
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Canonic name of a person entity that is a participant in an event/fact

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Person Employee
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a person that is an employee

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Person Employer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a person that is an employer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Person Investigated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The person that is being investigated in a company investigation.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Person Plaintiff
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Person that is a plaintiff in a legal issue

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Person Relative
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a family relative

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Person Source
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the analyst issuing an estimate or recommendation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Product
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Canonic name of a product entity that is a particpant in an event/fact

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Province or State
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: State, county or province that is a sub-part of a country

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Speaker
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The speaker quoted in the text

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Subject
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Extracted entity that is pointed to by a disambiguated entity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Target
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Company to be purchased

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Acquirer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Purchasing company

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Technology
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name or description of a type of technology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: TMT Company ID
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The primary identifier of a resolved company inside Thomson One.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Public
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A boolean attribute for indicating whether a company is public or private

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: URL
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The URL of a contact entity

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Location Destination
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Location name that is a destination of a person's travel

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Location Origin
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Location name that is an origin of a person's travel

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Accounting Change Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of change in the accounting method/policy - FY (fiscal year) or depreciation policy or accounting standard

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Company Contact Entity
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the company to contact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Person Contact Entity
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the person to contact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Person Contact Entity
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a second person to contact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Instant Messenger User Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The contact entity's Instant Messaging user name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Address
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Address of the contact entity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Affiliate Relation Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Nature of a relationship between business entities

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Aggregate
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The aggregate value of confidence comprised of dblookup, statistical features and resolution.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Black List
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Value Appears in Black List

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Analyst Revision
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Content of an Analyst's revision

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Bonus Shares Ratio
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Proportion of shares held to shares to be received

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Business Relation Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of business relation between two entities

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Calais Request ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for the processed request

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: OWL Ontology
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A link to the relevant OWL ontology

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Calculate Relevance Score
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the extracted metadata will include relevance score for each unique entity (processing directive in paramsXML)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Caller
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Used internally by various Calais apps

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Career Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the career is Political or Professional

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Category Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Human-friendly name for the identified content category/topic

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Change Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the change in the event, e.g., Enters, Leaves

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: charge
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Charge related to arrest, conviction, indictment or trial events

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Classifier Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Internal name of the Calais document classification module applied

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Common Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name with which a person is commonly referred by

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Company Location Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of a location where a company is based. For example: headquarters, center of operations, etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Company Meeting Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Nature of company meeting, based on topics to be discussed. For example: Annual General Meeting (AGM), Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM), etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Conference Call Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Nature of conference call, based on topics to be discussed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Contained by Country
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Country name that contains a resolved geography (city, province/state, country)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Contained by state
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: State name that contains a resolved geography

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Content Class
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Class of document's contect e.g. news, research

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Content Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Format of the input content as submitted by the user (processing direcgtive in paramsXML)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Company String
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The company that owns the physical asset

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Asset Type RCS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: RCS code of physical asset

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Document Source
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Document source as supplied in x-calais-source request header

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Announcement Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Announcement Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Transaction Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Transaction Date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Acquirer Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Acquirer Name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Acquirer PermId
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Acquirer PermId

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Target Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Target Name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Target PermId
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Target PermId

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Normalized date mentioned in text, either explicitly or relative to a DateString

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Date String
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Date mentioned in text

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Company CIK
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company CIK

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Company SIC
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company SIC

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Company Industry
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company Industry

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Fiscal Year End
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Fiscal Year End

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Street
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Street

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Street
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Street

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: City
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: City

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Province Or State
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Province Or State

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Country
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Country

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Zip Code
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Zip Code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Phone
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Phone

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: DB Lookup
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The component of confidence which relies on the existence of entity string in DB

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Debt Action
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Action that is taken to complete the debt financing event

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Debt Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of the financing instrument such as shares, bonds, notes etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Detection
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Text portions before and after a matched instance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Discard Meta Data
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the output will exclude Entity Disambiguation results (processing directives in paramsXML)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Dividend Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates the type of a dividend event - Cash or Shares

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Document Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Identified date of the submitted content (if mentioned)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Document Title
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Document title as identified by Calais (could also be empty)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Document
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Original content submitted converted into a Calais XML

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: em Version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Internal version name/number of the Calais Installation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Email Address 1
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Email address of a contact entity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Email Address 2
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Email address of a contact entity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Employees Number
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The number of employees employed or being laid off by a company

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Employees Percentage
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The percentage of employees being laid off by a company

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Employment Change Status
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Status of the change in employment - whether it is Announced or Planned

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Enable Metadata Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the output (RDF only) will include additional metadata

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: environmentalissue
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Environmental issue mentioned in the text

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: exact
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Text portion of a matched instance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Expansion Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of an expansion event, either New Market or New Unit

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: External ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the extracted metadata can be distributed (user directive in paramsXML)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: External Metadata
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: External Metadate section as submitted by the user

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Family Relation Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Family relationship of two individuals

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Fax
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The fax number of a contact entity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: FDA Stage
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Stage in the FDA approval process

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Filing Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of the filing associated with the event such as Form 10-K, Form 10-Q etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Financial Metric
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Normalized metric of financial results. For example: Revenues, Net Loss, Earnings Per Share (Diluted), etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Financial Trend
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Current rating or recommendation with respect to previous rating/recommendation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Event Fingerprint
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An event fingerprint

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Force Majeure
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The cause of the disruption of normal activity such as severe weather events, power outages etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Shortened version of the docId

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Importance
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Importance of an extracted element on a scale of 1-2 (1 is most important)

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Investigation Type
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of an investigation conducted on a company (Accounting / Others)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Selective Tags
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: User defined configuration for selecting which resolved entities will be extracted while filtering out everything else

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Unresolved Entities Filtered
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: User selected configuration for selective annotation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Language
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Human-friendly name for the Identified language of the submitted content

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Latitude
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Latitude of a disambiguated geography

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Law Suit Class
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Class of a legal issue. Possible values are: Class action or lawsuit

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Length
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Length of the matched text (in characters) for each identified instance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Longitude
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Longitude of a disambiguated geography

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Manmade Disaster
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Phrase describing a man-made disaster

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Message Code
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Internal code for an error message

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: MXID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The MXID of a company

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of an extracted or disambiguated element

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Short Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a category without (TRBC)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: FirstName
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A Person's first name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: MiddleName
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A Person's middle name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: LastName
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A Person's last name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Nationality
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Nationality of an identified entity such as Person, Company, Organization if mentioned in the document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: RecognizedAs
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Denotes the company extractor: name, ric or ticker

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: RIC
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: RIC as indicated next to the company name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Natural Disaster
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Phrase describing a natural disaster

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Offset
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Offset of the matched text (in characters, from the beginning of the document) for each identified instance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Organization Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Organization classification. Possible values: sports, governmental military, governmental civilian, political party. N/A.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Original Value
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Original value of a social tag

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Other Charges
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: List of additional charges related to arrest, conviction, indictment or trial events

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Output Format
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Format of the returned results (processing directive in paramsXML)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Patent Description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Phrase describing a patent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Patent Number
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of an issued/registered patent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Person ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The ID of the person from a TR dataset

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: PA ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The ID of the person from a Person Authority

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Person Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Person classification. Possible values: sports, entertainment, political, economic, military. N/A

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Primary RIC
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: NDA's persistent identifier (PI) of a company

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Political Event Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of a political event, such as: elections, primaries, etc...

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Position
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Title of position that a person holds, will hold, or held.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: PositionNormalized
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A normalized position for legal people

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Prefix
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Text portion before a matched instance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Price New
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Target price quoted.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Price_Old
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Previous target price.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Primary ILX
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company's primary ILX

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Primary RIC
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company's primary RIC

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Processing Version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Internal version of the tagging process

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Product Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Product classification. Possible values: drug, car, aircraft electronics. N/A

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Quarter
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Quarter number referred to in text

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Quotation
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Direct or indirect excerpt of communication

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Quotation Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Primary/Paraphrase - 'Primary' (quotation is marked by overt quote markers) or 'Paraphrase' (otherwise).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Rank New
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: New or current rank of a company's equity or debt

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Rank Old
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Previous rank of a company's equity or debt

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: RCS Code
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Entity's RCS code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Recalled Quantity
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Quantity of a product that is being recalled

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Relevance
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Discrete Relevance score in the rage 0-1 of each extracted entity; indicates the importance of an entity relative to the current document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Relevance
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Continuous Relevance score in the rage 0-1 of each extracted entity; indicates the importance of an entity relative to the current document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Rel Tag Base URL
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Base URL to be put in rel-tag microformats (processing directives in paramsXML)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Resolution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The component of confidence which relies on the existence of resolution for entity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Revision Direction
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The direction of a revision

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Revision Measure
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The measure of a revision

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: RIC
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: a market index RIC

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Score
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Confidence score (range: 0 lowest - 1 highest) of the assigned type/topic

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Slugline
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Slugline name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Slugline ID
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Slugline ID

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Is active flag for slugline
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Is active flag for slugline

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Slugline creation date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Slugline creation date

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Significance
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Significance level (Low/Medium/High/Error)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Significance Error Message
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Significance Error Message

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Risk
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Risk name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Risk RCS Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Risk RCS Name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Risk RCS Code
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Risk RCS Code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sector RCS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The RCS code of the Sector of the primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sector Numeric
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The numeric code of the Sector of the primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sub-Sector RCS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The RCS code of the Sub-Sector of the primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sub-Sector Numeric
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The numeric code of the Sub-Sector of the primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Industry RCS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The RCS code of a primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Industry Numeric
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The numeric code of a primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sub-Industry RCS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The RCS code of a sub-industry of a primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sub-Industry Numeric
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The numeric code of a sub-industry of a primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sector GICS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The GICS code of the sector of the primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sub-Sector GICS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The GICS code of the sub-sector of the primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Industry GICS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The GICS code of the primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sub-Industry GICS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The GICS code of the sub industry of the primary/secondary Industry identified in a research document

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Short Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A name which a resolved entity is often referred by

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Signature
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Security signature of the RDF content returned by Calais

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Social Tag
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The value of a topical tag suggested to describe the general topic or aboutness of a submitted article

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Social Tag Version
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The version of the Social Tagger

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Statistical Feature
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The component of confidence which relies on statistical features

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Status
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Status of various events and facts based on the context of the text. For example: announced, planned, cancelled, postponed, rumored, known, closed, new, etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Stockexchange
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Normalized name of the stock exchange

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Stock Split Ratio
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Proportion of shares held before the split to shares after the split

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Submission Date
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Time stamp for the processed request

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Truncated Text Length
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Length of the text that was actually processed if truncation took place

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Submitter
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Identifier for the content submitter (user directive in paramsXML)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Submitter Code
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Encrypted license key of the submitter

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sued Description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of an entity that is being sued

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Suffix
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Text portions after a matched instance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Telephone 1
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The telephone number of the contact entity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Telephone 2
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The telephone number of the contact entity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Text
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Human-friendly text that describes an error message

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Ticker
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Stock symbol

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Primary TRBC Code
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company's Thomson-Reuters Business Classification code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Unit
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Company's unit such as department name of region name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Year
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Year related to an event/fact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Zone Confidence
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Confidence that zone detection is correct

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Zone String
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The String Identified as the zone

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Zone Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type Of Zone

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Gender
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A person's gender

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Person Relation Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of relationship between two people. For example: business, Academic Military, Romantic, etc.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: TRBC Code
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Entity's TRBC code

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Onwner Permid
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The permid of the owning Organization

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Onwner Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The name of the owning Organization

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Document Category
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted content category/topic

owl:Class.rdfs:label: City
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes an entity that is a city, village or settlement

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted company name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Continent
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Describes an entity that is a continent

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Country
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted country name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Editor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted editor name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Facility
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted facility - a man-made physical entity

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Currency
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Markup of a currency indication

owl:Class.rdfs:label: URL
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Markup of a URL address

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PhoneNumber
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Markup of a phone number

owl:Class.rdfs:label: EmailAddress
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Markup of an e-mail address

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Industry Term
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Term related to a specific industry

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person Attributes
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted personal information, such as age, gender, birthdate and birthplace

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person Relation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of various relationships between people, such as Military, Romantic, etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person Travel
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of a person's travel from one place to another

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Journalist
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted journalist name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Market Index
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted market index

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Markup Entity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of an extracted entity name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Organization
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted organization name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted person name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Place
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of an extracted place name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Political Event
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A political event, such as elections.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Product
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted product name (drug, car models, electronics, etc.)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Pharmaceutical Drug
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted Pharmaceutical Drug

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Province Or State
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted province, state or county name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Published Medium
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted published medium - newspapers, magazines, etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Natural Feature
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Places such as rivers, seas, lakes, mountains and names of geographical regions

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Region
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted region

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SEC Form Type
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an SEC form type

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SEC Reporting Company
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an SEC reporting company

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SECCompanyCIK
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: SECCompanyCIK

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SECCompanyFiscalYearEnd
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: SECCompanyFiscalYearEnd

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PrivateEquity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Private Equity Indication

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SECCompanyFormerName
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: SECCompanyFormerName

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SECCompanyIndustrySIC
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: SECCompanyIndustrySIC

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SECCompanyLocation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: SECCompanyLocation

owl:Class.rdfs:label: SEC Report Period
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an SEC report period

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Technology
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted technology name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Acquisition
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted acquisition relation between multiple companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Alliance
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted alliance relation between multiple companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Analyst Earnings Estimate
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted analyst earnings estimate mentioned - estimates given by external analysts regarding the forecasted earnings of companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Analyst Revision
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted analyst revision mentioned

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Analyst Recommendation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted stock recommendation mentioned - recommendation given by external analysts regarding the company's equity

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Arrest
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted arrest event

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bankruptcy
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted company's bankruptcy mention

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bonus Shares Inssurance
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted bonus shares issuance

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Business Relation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted business relation mentioned between multiple companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Buybacks
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted buyback event

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Accounting Change
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted reference to a company changing its accounting methods, such as fiscal year change, adopting new accounting standards etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Affiliates
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted parent-subsidiary relation between two companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Customer
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted supplier-customer relation between two companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Relationship
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted supplier-customer relation between two companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Earnings Announcement
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted earnings announcement event made by companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Deal
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Deal between two copmanies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Earnings Guidance
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted earnings forecast/guidance event made by companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Employees Number
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of the number of employees in a company

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Expansion
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted event of company expansion

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Force Majeure
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted force majeure event related to companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Founded
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of the founding year of a company

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Investigation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Investigation conducted on a company, usually by a regulator

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Investment
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted company investment/funding mention

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Labor Issues
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted labor-related event, such as strikes initiated by a company's employees

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Layoffs
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of companies laying off people

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Legal Issues
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted legal issue involving a company

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Listing Change
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of any change in listing for a company in a known Stock Exchange

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Location
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted information about company's location

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Meeting
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted announcement of meetings (e.g., AGM, EGM) initiated by companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Name Change
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted event of company changing its name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Product
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of a product offered by a company

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Reorganization
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of reorganization/restructuring of companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Restatement
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of companies restating their financials

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Technology
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of a technology offered by a company

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Ticker
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of company's ticker and stock exchange where it's traded

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Using Product
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of a customer (company or organization) using products of another company

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Conference Call
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted announcement of a conference call initiated by companies to review financial results

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Contact Details
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Contact information of a person or company, including telephone number, address etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Conviction
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted conviction event

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Credit Rating
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of rating the credit of companies or organizations

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Debt Financing
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of companies seeking to finance their debt

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Delayed Filing
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of company submitting its quarterly or annual reports in delay

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dividend
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted reference to dividend-related announcement - dividend increase, descrease, pay etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Employment Change
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of change of employment relative to people, companies or organizations

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Employment Relation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted relation between an employer person to an employee person

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Environmental Issue
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of various environmental issues

owl:Class.rdfs:label: FDA Phase
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of a drug's phase in the US FDA's approval process

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Family Relation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of family relation such as husband-wife, parent-child, etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: IPO
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of company's initial public offering

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Indictment
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted indictment event

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Joint Venture
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted joint venture event between companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Man Made Disaster
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of a specific man-made disaster

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Merger
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted merger event between companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Natural Disaster
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of a specific natural disaster

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Patent Filing
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of patent filing by companies or organizations

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Patent Issuance
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of patent issuance granted to companies or organizations

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person Career
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of person's position and the associated company, organization or place

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Product Issues
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of issues/problems with certain products

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Product Recall
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted announcement of company recalling its products

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Product Release
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted announcement of company releasing new products

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Quotation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted quotation and its speaker

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Relation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of an extracted relation

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Secondary Issuance
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted mention of secondary stock issuance

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stock Split
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted Stock Split relation mention - stock splits announced by companies

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Trial
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted trial event

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Zoning Section
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of an extracted zoning section

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company-disambiguated
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a disambiguated company name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company-disambiguated Top Most Public Parent
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resolution node for top most public parent

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Geographical entity-disambiguated
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a disambiguated city name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: City-disambiguated
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a disambiguated city name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Country-disambiguated
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a disambiguated country name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: ProvinceOrState-disambiguated
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a disambiguated province/state name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Product entity-disambiguated
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a disambiguated Product

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person-disambiguated
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a disambiguated person name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resolved Entity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a resolved entity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a resolved refinery

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a resolved power station

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Physical Asset
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a markup physical asset

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Refinery
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a markup refinery

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Vessel
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a markup vessel

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Port
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a markup port

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a markup mine

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PowerS tation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a markup power station

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resolved Relation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a resolved relation

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resolved Deal
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A type of a resolved deal

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Default Language Id
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of the identified language for the current document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Document Information
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of the node that includes the tentire transaction: paramsXML and the submitted content

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Document Information Meta
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of the node that presents meta-info generated by Calais

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Instance Information
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of the node that presents details about individual instances of Calais types

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Message
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of the node that contains error messages

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PE Information
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of the node that presents additional information about PE

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Relevance Information
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of the node that presents information about relevance ranking assiged to Calais entities

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Research Company
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a company tagged in a research document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Primary Company
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a primary company tagged in a research document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Secondary Company
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a secondary company tagged in a research document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Confidence on Markup-Entity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a tag suggested to describe how confident we are that the markup entity is indeed of a specific type

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Document level significance
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The degree of significance for a given story

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Risk
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Risk about Company or Person

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Slugline
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Slugline name

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Industry Tag
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An industry classification of this document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Research Industry Tag
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The industry classification of a research document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Primary Industry Tag
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The primary industry classification of a research document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Secondary Industry Tag
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The secondary industry classification of a research document

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Social Tag
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The type of a tag suggested to describe the general topic or aboutness of a submitted article

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Components Versions
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Versions of selected server components

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Political Entity
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Political Entity

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entertainment Award Event
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to entertainment-related events and awards, such as film and music festivals and awards related to the entertainment industry.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person Communication
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An extracted reference to communications (meeting, phone call, etc.) between people or groups of people

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Organization or Company
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a company or an organization

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Person Description
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of person involved in an event/fact

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person Education
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An extracted mention of person's academic degrees or certifications.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Certification
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Professional credential or certification

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Degree
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Academic degree awarded

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: School Organization
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Academic institution

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person Email Address
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An extracted mention of a person's email address

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: emailaddress
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Email address mentioned in the document.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Position
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts information concerning position that a person holds, will hold, or held.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Fax Number
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts a full fax number, including prefix and extension, if available.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Company Competitor
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An extracted competition relation between two companies

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Diplomatic Entity 1
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The first diplomatic entity in a diplomatic relationship.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Diplomatic Entity 2
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The second diplomatic entity in a diplomatic relationship.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Political Relationship
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An extracted relation (Alliance or Rivalry) between two political entities

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Political Entity 1
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The first political entity in a political relationship.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Political Entity 2
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The second political entity in a political relationship.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Political Relationship Type
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of political relationship:"alliance" or "rivalry".

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Movie
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to movies and films.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Music Album
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to music albums, CDs, etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Music Group
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to music groups and bands.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Radio Program
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to radio programs.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Radio Station
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to radio stations. This entity type is currently focused on U.S. radio stations, although it may identify non-U.S. stations as well.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TV Show
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to TV shows and programs.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Movie Release
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An extracted reference to a movie release (past, present, future) or mentions of new movies.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Movie
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the movie/film

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Music Album Release
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An extracted mention of a music album release (past, present future) or mentions of new music albums.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Music Album
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the music album

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Music Group Performer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a music group performing or releasing a music album

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Person Performer
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of a person (artist) performing or releasing a music album

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Medical Condition
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to human medical conditions, such as diseases, disorders and syndromes.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Medical Treatment
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to medical treatments - procedures, treatments and therapeutics provided to any medical condition.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sports Event
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to sports-related tournaments and championships.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sports Game
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to sports games like football, baseball, soccer, etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sports League
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts names of sports leagues. Note that some sports leagues may also be extracted as organizations.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Extinction
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An extracted mention of species extinction

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Species
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Plant or animal species affected by extinction events

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Holiday
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references of holidays.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Anniversary
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts a reference to an anniversary

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Operating System
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to operating systems.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Programming Language
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to programming languages

owl:Class.rdfs:label: TV Station
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Extracts references to TV stations. This entity type is currently focused on U.S. TV stations, although it may identify non-U.S. stations as well.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: PersonLocation
owl:Class.rdfs:comment: PersonLocation
